item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (34 points | 3 comments)
2. From Pegasus to Predator – The evolution of commercial spyware on iOS [video] (217 points | 72 comments)
3. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (266 points | 41 comments)
4. KAG – Knowledge Graph RAG Framework (99 points | 22 comments)
5. VW Group Collects Vehicle Movement Data (54 points | 8 comments)
6. The Cody Computer (156 points | 13 comments)
7. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (70 points | 12 comments)
8. Nikon reveals a lens that captures wide and telephoto images simultaneously (71 points | 33 comments)
9. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (15 points | 8 comments)
10. Overloading the lambda abstraction in Haskell (2022) (31 points | 2 comments)
11. The Zombocom Problem (174 points | 46 comments)
12. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (214 points | 22 comments)
13. Against the Hydraulic Analogy (13 points | 5 comments)
14. Neuters: Lightweight front end to Reuters News (60 points | 39 comments)
15. Issues with object-oriented programming in Guile (24 points | 2 comments)
16. Reverse Video Search (7 points | 3 comments)
17. The last Inca bridge master (112 points | 25 comments)
18. Archibald Low's ‘ruthlessly imaginative’ 1925 predictions come true, mostly (39 points | 16 comments)
19. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (3 points | discuss)
20. Rod Serling on Doomsday (41 points | 7 comments)
21. Show HN: Chorus, a Mac app that lets you chat with a bunch of AIs at once (94 points | 39 comments)
22. Trying to use Bluesky without getting burned again (213 points | 338 comments)
23. WebGL Fluid Simulation (418 points | 55 comments)
24. Was zombie-Bench just acquired? (16 points | 5 comments)
25. Is Iceland getting ready to join the EU? (257 points | 489 comments)
26. The history of twisted-pair Ethernet [video] (102 points | 16 comments)
27. Brave Care Has Closed (57 points | 103 comments)
28. Breaking NATO Radio Encryption [video] (128 points | 32 comments)
29. Jimmy Carter has died (1065 points | 621 comments)
30. OpenAI’s board, paraphrased: ‘All we need is unimaginable sums of money’ (253 points | 226 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
